info.name: CSC 436 - Project 4 - REST API (2025)
info.description:
Example Postman Collection for Project 4 - REST API with Express.js and LowDB

Updated for 2025:
- Express 4.21.x
- LowDB 7.x (ESM-only)
- uuid 11.x+ (ESM-only)
- Node.js 24 LTS

request.description: Get API documentation and available endpoints

Retrieve all games in the collection. Returns an array of all game objects.

Expected Response:
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: { success: true, count: number, data: [] }

variable.description: Replace with actual game UUID from a POST response

request.description:
Retrieve a single game by its unique UUID.

Expected Responses:
- 200 OK: Game found
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid UUID format
- 404 Not Found: Game doesn't exist

Create a new game.

Required fields:
- title (string)
- genre (string)

Optional fields:
- platform (string, defaults to 'Unknown')
- releaseYear (number, defaults to current year)

Expected Responses:
- 201 Created: Game created successfully
- 400 Bad Request: Missing required fields

Update an existing game. Only include fields you want to update.

Expected Responses:
- 200 OK: Game updated successfully
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid UUID format
- 404 Not Found: Game doesn't exist

Delete a game by UUID. Returns the deleted game object.

Expected Responses:
- 200 OK: Game deleted successfully
- 400 Bad Request: Invalid UUID format
- 404 Not Found: Game doesn't exist
